name: JetFight (Meteora)
description:
JetFight is a dynamical FPS/platformer in 1vs1. The goal: making the opponent fall in the void. To do that you have 2 weapons: a pistol and an hammer. Vous can move from platform to platform using a jetpack, while paying attention to your energy bar so as not to fall. Be careful not to be too static because the platforms have traps !

--This game is in split screen and you have to use 2 gamepads--
